HPI 8111 Nissan Skyline Skyline GT-R 1993 JTC Series Winner/2nd Place K. Hoshino/M. Kageyama

Kazuyoshi Hoshino & Masahiko Kageyama were teammates again in 1993 They had much better luck this year, winning 4 of the 9 rounds and crushing the JTC-1 class competition. No other team had more than 1 win. This was the last season for the Group A-based JTC series that was essentially a one-make (Skyline GT-R) series.

Here is a short clip of Hoshino & Kageyama in action: https://youtu.be/vbHu1vPOSj4?t=4m31s
